review: This appears to me to be a medium to purchase subscriptions, with little value in itself. By the time I bought enough subscriptions to justify owning this, they ought to be crediting me for the box. I personally will be connecting a computer to my television so I can hopefully have all the subscriptions that I want, but also be able to use a fully-fledged computer functionality. I didn't purchase it for the games, so there might be some value there.
